thread.title: Andy Bailey
thread.title_full: Bundle Stars reviewed by Andy Bailey

author: Andy Bailey
title: Andy Bailey
text:
I'm really pleased when news of a new bundle arrives at bundlestars , I always try to grab it and the games are always ones with good reviews or in the case of dollar bundles, worth the pennies that they cost even if they can entertain you for 10 minutes.
The last dollar bundle I got has resulted in hours and hours of play so I would give them a double thumbs up if they didn't hurt so much from playing the games!
